name: the thing.
description:
when i was small and my grandmother died, i started to have nightmares. it is, as i remember, the first time i experienced anxiety. the dreams came every sunday for more than ten years, always the same. always this flesh toned slime ball, pulsing and throbbing, coming to suffocate me. 

i never thought i would be able to create a visual representation of this thing, but one day i sat down and it just came out of me. it doesn't feel very good right now. in fact, it fills me with panic to look at. but i can't help but romanticize the idea that the very thing that terrifies me the most may be the most freeing thing i have ever done for my soul.

and so i share it here, with you. mostly to get what is inside of me, out.
